annonsrubrik: Technical Engineer within Azure, Network and Storage skillset
annonstext:
Company Description

Welcome to Customer Commerce Delivery area and our team Commerce Reliability! We are a part of Customer Domain within Business Tech working with the H&M Group Online Stores. As a team we are on an exciting journey, focusing on application platforms in Cloud to enable a superior shopping experience with a high availability! 

 

Job Description

We are now looking for a Technical Engineer with a strong skillset within Azure Cloud as well as storage and network. You will join a very experienced team that is one of our Commerce Reliability teams managing our online platform globally and cross H&M group brands with 51 online markets. 

As Technical Engineer at H&M Business Tech, you will work in an agile context and take responsibility within our Online platforms. We have completed our first steps into a cloud-based environment and as the journey continue, we are investigating how the future online platform should look with a microservice architecture. You will connect with internal business development teams and continuously support in improving the current and future solutions.

What you´ll do 

In co-operation with other team members work on our Online platforms:

	Plan & perform upgrades and changes
	Troubleshooting of platform services and components
	Driving innovation for our future landscape in improving work on setup, align to new functionalities and implement industry best practices
	Keep on developing and improving our setup 

What you´ll bring  

As a Technical Engineer at H&M Business Tech you will embark on a journey that will lead to something new and exciting - we will test, fail and learn. You are an important player in this transformation, and so we believe you are communicative, have a “You build it you run it” mindset and able to work in an environment that is not yet formalized.

	Deep understanding of Microsoft Azure
	Deep understanding of Network
	Deep understanding of Storage
	Good knowledge in DevOps CI/CD pipeline
	Good knowledge Technical Architectural Design
	Some knowledge in SAP Hybris
	Experience of working in large organizations
	Experience of working closely with functional developers and technical teams to understand their needs
	Experience of working in agile development organizations
	Are fluent in written and spoken English 

What we can offer 

At H&M we have a strong, value-driven culture characterized by believing in people, teamwork and an entrepreneurial spirit. Here you can be yourself and develop. You’ll be part of an important project at H&M Group with significant opportunities to influence and make a difference. With the right mindset and ambition, you’ll find plenty of room to grow. We welcome your application regardless of gender, age, gender expressions, sexual orientation, disabilities, religious beliefs, origin or background. 

If this sounds exciting to you, come join the journey and build the future with us! 

This is a full-time position with placement in Stockholm. Please apply before March 16th, 2021. If you have any questions about the role, feel free to contact Product Owner  EMAIL  and if you have any questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact  EMAIL   

 

We are looking forward to your application! 

 

Additional Information

We are on an exciting journey to meet and exceed our customers' expectations today, tomorrow and in the future. Rapid technological development and new customer behaviours are transforming the fashion retail industry. To cater the individual needs and desires of our millions of customers, Business Tech delivers technological solutions for the entire value chain for all our brands.  

The best ideas evolve when great minds with different perspectives get together. We’re all on the same team in a global environment and we learn from each other. There are endless opportunities to grow – your development is all up to you!  

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. We strongly believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees and a better product for our users. H&M Group – Business Tech.
